troy_adi_champion_aphareus_speed_aura.tooltipText: "Death is the final message, and we will be the ones to bear it!"
troy_adi_champion_aphareus_speed_aura.tooltipZhCn: “死亡是最终的消息，而我们将是这消息的使者！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipText: "The poison tip penetrates the shield, or armour plates, right through to the skin – and from there, the soul itself."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipZhCn: “剧毒之刺可以穿透盾牌和盔甲，刺进皮肤——借此洞穿敌人的灵魂。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_serrated_weapons.tooltipText: "The barbed blade is particularly vicious, for it is not just the strike which wounds, but in pulling out the blade also."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_serrated_weapons.tooltipZhCn: “枪刃上的倒钩尤为致命，刺入体内已是鲜血淋漓，拔出之时更将皮开肉绽。”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover_sp.tooltipText: "Almighty Zeus, king of the gods, shield me from my enemies' blows, that I might fight for you another day."
troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover_sp.tooltipZhCn: “全能的宙斯，众神之王，请庇护我，让我在敌人的攻击中屹立不倒。择日我定会为你而战。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_warriors_pledge_p.tooltipText: "Fight hard, and long, and knoweth that your companions stand with you!"
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_warriors_pledge_p.tooltipZhCn: “狠斗、久斗，常有战友伴我左右！”

troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipText: "Gods, focus my mind and body so that hunter and quarry are all that matter!"
troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipZhCn: “众神啊，请让我的全身心都投入狩猎吧！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.5|战斗获得怒气*2.0|非战斗获得怒气+3.0
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipText: "Fear me, for the blood of the greatest hero of the known world courses through my veins!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipZhCn: “畏惧我吧，我的血管里流淌的乃是世界上最伟大英雄的血脉！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter.tooltipText: "With bloody fists I'll batter – like a ten ton hammer, son!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter.tooltipZhCn: “小子，我这双拳头可不是吃素的！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.dataEffect: 护甲-40.0|近战基础伤害*1.5|近战攻击+50.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipText: "You think you can strike me down? Only the Moirai can decree my fate!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipZhCn: “你觉得能击倒我？只有摩伊拉三女神能裁定我的命运！”

troy_main_hero_self_passive_regeneration.tooltipText: "It is not by happenstance that the experienced warrior continues to defy the odds and lives, it is the will of the gods that dictates it!"
troy_main_hero_self_passive_regeneration.tooltipZhCn: “老练的战士总能克服困难、绝境求生，这并非偶然，而是众神的旨意！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on_.tooltipText: "To me! We go on until the gods themselves command that we halt!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on_.tooltipZhCn: “过来！除非众神有令，否则绝不要停下！”

troy_main_duel.tooltipText: "We must fight until only one remains!"

troy_myth_sirens_lure.tooltipText: "No one can resist the melody of our song. Come sailor, come to your death."
troy_myth_sirens_lure.tooltipZhCn: “没人能抵挡我们的歌喉。来吧，水手，来拥抱你的死亡。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape_spe.tooltipText: "It is not luck or fortune, or some special ability that the foe has that we do not, that allowed us to evade death, it was the will of the gods."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape_spe.tooltipZhCn: “让我们逃离死亡的并非某种敌人独有的本事，也无关好运，而是众神的旨意。”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace_sp.dataEffect: 速度*0.4|抵御冲锋能力*3.0|护甲+25.0
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace_sp.tooltipText: "Not even the mighty Heracles himself can move me from this spot!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace_sp.tooltipZhCn: “哪怕是大能的赫拉克勒斯来了，也休想让我从这里动摇半步。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_warriors_pledge_r.tooltipText: "We will go on to the bitter end, no matter the cost and regardless of the odds! The gods will it!"
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_warriors_pledge_r.tooltipZhCn: “无论付出多少代价，无论希望多么渺茫，我们都将血战到底！这是众神的意愿！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipText: "Release the birds! May this improper omen turn our enemies' bowels to water! In sight of the gods, yes!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipZhCn: “释放群鸟！众神在上，愿这不祥之兆为敌人带去毁灭！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.attributeEffect: 引发恐惧|狂暴|死战不退
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipText: "By Ares, I shall drown the world in flames!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipZhCn: “以阿瑞斯之名，我要让世界燃起烈火！”

troy_main_duel_spec_duration.tooltipText: "We must fight until only one remains!"

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.dataEffect: 护甲-20.0|近战基础伤害*1.5|近战攻击+50.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipText: "You think you can strike me down? Only the Moirai can decree my fate!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipZhCn: “你觉得能击倒我？只有摩伊拉三女神能裁定我的命运！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipText: "O mighty lords of Olympus! Lend me strength and cunning to defeat the foe!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipZhCn: “强大的奥林匹斯众神！借我力量与智慧，令我击败敌人吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.attributeEffect: 引发恐惧|狂暴|死战不退
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipText: "By Ares, I shall drown the world in flames!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipZhCn: “以阿瑞斯之名，我要让世界燃起烈火！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.nameZhCn: 赫拉克勒斯之血（战斗移速）
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.dataEffect: 速度*1.25|近战攻击*1.5|战斗获得怒气*2.0|非战斗获得怒气+3.0
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipText: "Fear me, for the blood of the greatest hero in the known world courses through my veins!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipZhCn: “畏惧我吧，世间至伟英雄的血脉就在我体内流淌！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain.tooltipText: "Pah! You think your puny weapons can strike me down? I am invincible!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain.tooltipZhCn: “呸！你觉得你那小破武器能打倒我？我是无敌的！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.1|近战基础伤害*1.1|近战防御*1.1
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipText: "Follow me and I shall lead you to glory without end!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipZhCn: “追随我，让我引领你们夺取无上的荣耀！”

troy_main_hero_self_sunder.tooltipText: "Ares' rage and Poseidon's strength combine! Tear bronze and flesh like so much cloth!"
troy_main_hero_self_sunder.tooltipZhCn: “用阿瑞斯的愤怒加上波塞冬的力量！像撕扯破布一样切开铠甲和血肉！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipText: "May Apollo, lord of light, pour into me and strike you dead where you stand!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipZhCn: “愿光之王阿波罗赐予我力量，然后就地击败你！”

troy_adi_unit_ajax_charge.tooltipText: "Stand apart, my warriors. They will not break our line by shaft or arrow flight alone."
troy_adi_unit_ajax_charge.tooltipZhCn: “分散开来，我的勇士们。别让标枪或是箭矢打乱我们的阵线。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipText: "You demand honour for the fallen? They had their chance to earn it whilst still they lived!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipZhCn: “你想为死者讨回公道？他们生前可是亲手浪费了机会！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipText: "You demand honour for the fallen? They had their chance to earn it whilst still they lived!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipZhCn: “你想为死者讨回公道？他们生前可是亲手浪费了机会！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipText: "Keep the enemy distracted! Strike at their flanks before they recover!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipZhCn: “牵制敌军！从侧翼杀他们个措手不及！”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_skittish_horses.tooltipText: "Hey now, woah. Shhhh. We're almost there – then you can rest."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_skittish_horses.tooltipZhCn: “驾，驾，吁——我们马上就到了，到时候你就能好好休息了。”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipText: "May Ares' sons strike paralysing terror into your hearts!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipZhCn: “愿阿瑞斯之子把恐惧刻在你的心里！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt_sp.tooltipText: "Face me now, or fearsome Ares shall visit his fury upon you!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt_sp.tooltipZhCn: “快点站出来，不然就等着面对阿瑞斯的怒火吧！”

troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔-1.0|近战防御*0.85|冲锋速度*1.15|冲锋加成*1.2
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipText: "The final swing is not a drill, it's how many people I can kill!"
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipZhCn: “嘿兄弟这可不是练习，接下我的最后一击，然后细数我的胜利！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.dataEffect: 护甲-40.0|近战基础伤害*1.75|近战攻击+50.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipText: "You think you can strike me down? Only the Moirai can decree my fate!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_bow_to_th.tooltipZhCn: “你觉得能击倒我？只有摩伊拉三女神能裁定我的命运！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe.dataEffect: 远程基础伤害*1.3|近战防御+30.0|远程抗性+30.0
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe.tooltipText: "Move with the speed of Hermes and strike with Artemis' peerless skill."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe.tooltipZhCn: “以赫耳墨斯的速度奔跑，以阿耳忒弥斯的完美技艺攻击。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipText: "From Olympus itself, strike at my enemies with your rain of death, Apollo almighty!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipZhCn: “全能的阿波罗啊，从奥林匹斯山上向我的敌人降下死亡吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify_m.tooltipText: "Cower, foolish humans, for Phobos and Deimos move among your feeble number!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify_m.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，愚蠢的凡人，福波斯和德摩斯就在你们当中！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipText: "Strike on the move! Swift as a mare, like Lord Chiron taught us!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipZhCn: “开始行动！就像脱缰的野马那样，这是喀戎的教诲！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipText: "O mighty lords of Olympus! Lend me strength and cunning to defeat the foe!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipZhCn: “强大的奥林匹斯众神！借我力量与智慧，令我击败敌人吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy_sp.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*-1.0|近战基础伤害*1.3|增加12.0%疲劳值
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy_sp.tooltipText: "As murderous Ares is my witness, I shall see you all dead before my rage is quenched!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy_sp.tooltipZhCn: “凶残的阿瑞斯见证，我的怒火平息前，你们都得死！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipText: "I scream your name to the heavens, Heracles! Grant me your indomitable might!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipZhCn: “我大声呼喊你的名字直达天庭，赫拉克勒斯！将你不可战胜的力量赐给我吧！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_sp.tooltipText: "Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_sp.tooltipZhCn: “噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你些微的力量赐予我，让我在敌阵中掀起血雨腥风！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipText: "Tire not, companions! Titanblood courses through our veins!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipZhCn: “勇士们，不要懈怠！我们的血管中流淌着泰坦的血脉！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.dataEffect: 近战基础伤害*1.6|战斗获得怒气+2.0|非战斗获得怒气+2.0|士气+20.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipText: "Accept this sacrifice, o mighty lords of Olympus! Sanctify my blood with your divine purpose!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipZhCn: “接受这份牺牲吧，伟大的奥林匹斯众神！用你们的神性洗清我血中的罪孽！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain_s.tooltipText: "Pah! You think your puny weapons can strike me down? I am invincible!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain_s.tooltipZhCn: “呸！你觉得你那小破武器能打倒我？我是无敌的！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye.tooltipText: "Run all you like! You'll never escape Artemis' perfect aim!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye.tooltipZhCn: “尽管跑吧！你永远无法逃脱阿耳忒弥斯完美的瞄准！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipText: "Divine Artemis, lend me the swiftness of your animal subjects!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipZhCn: “神圣的阿耳忒弥斯，将你猛兽般的迅捷赐于我吧！”

troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*0.75|速度*1.25|溅射攻击威力*1.3|冲锋加成*1.5
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter.tooltipText: Chaos and despair break all enemy lines.
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter.tooltipZhCn: 混乱与绝望能摧毁所有敌人的阵线。

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_insult.tooltipText: "Go boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person!"

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.dataEffect: 速度*1.2|近战破甲伤害*1.25|冲锋加成*1.5
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.tooltipText: "Begone, defeated worm! You are unworthy of facing me!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.tooltipZhCn: “退散吧，战败的虫豸！你不配面对我！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipText: "I bring Ares' gift of death to all of you here today! Take that!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipZhCn: “阿瑞斯托我带了礼物，那就是你们的死亡！来吧！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.dataEffect: 近战基础伤害*1.15|冲锋速度*1.3
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.tooltipText: "I'll wake the silence in you, I'll shoot the violence through you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.tooltipZhCn: “唤醒心中野兽，勇取敌军人头！”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_relentless.tooltipText: "A passion for battle has flowed into them from Ares himself, and spread between each; even if their leader falls, they will fight on and on."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_relentless.tooltipZhCn: “承自阿瑞斯的战斗狂热在她们间相互传递；哪怕领袖倒下，她们也将奋战到底。”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipText: "May Lord Ares, slayer of men, strike at your heart and paralyse you with dread!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipZhCn: “愿凡人杀手阿瑞斯屠戮你的肉体，让你魂飞魄散！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_sp.tooltipText: "Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_sp.tooltipZhCn: “噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你些微的力量赐予我，让我在敌阵中掀起血雨腥风！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, grant me your tenacity as I stare into the face of Hades!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，在我面对哈得斯时将您的坚韧赐予我吧！”

troy_serrated_weapons_enabled_ticker_ico.tooltipText: "The barbed blade is particularly vicious, for it is not just the strike which wounds, but in pulling out the blade also."
troy_serrated_weapons_enabled_ticker_ico.tooltipZhCn: “枪刃上的倒钩尤为致命，刺入体内已是鲜血淋漓，拔出之时更将皮开肉绽。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipText: "May Apollo, lord of light, pour into me and strike you dead where you stand!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipZhCn: “愿光之王阿波罗赐予我力量，然后就地击败你！”

troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_spe.tooltipText: Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!
troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_spe.tooltipZhCn: 噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你些微的力量赐予我，让我在敌阵中掀起血雨腥风！

troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover_sp.tooltipText: "Almighty Zeus, king of the gods, shield me from my enemies' blows, that I might fight for you another day."
troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover_sp.tooltipZhCn: “全能的宙斯，众神之王，请庇护我，让我在敌人的攻击中屹立不倒。择日我定会为你而战。”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.5|战斗获得怒气*2.0|非战斗获得怒气+3.0
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipText: "Fear me, for the blood of the greatest hero in the known world courses through my veins!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_adrenaline_ru.tooltipZhCn: “畏惧我吧，世间至伟英雄的血脉就在我体内流淌！”

troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔-1.0|近战防御*0.85
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipText: "The final swing is not a drill, it's how many people I can kill!"
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipZhCn: “嘿兄弟这可不是练习，接下我的最后一击，然后细数我的胜利！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipText: "Never lose sight of victory, that glorious prize that the gods have laid out for you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipZhCn: “永远不要失去胜利的希望，众神早已为你备好奖赏。”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipText: "May Lord Ares, slayer of men, strike at your heart and paralyse you with dread!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipZhCn: “愿凡人杀手阿瑞斯屠戮你的肉体，让你魂飞魄散！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye_.tooltipText: "Run all you like! You'll never escape Artemis' perfect aim!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye_.tooltipZhCn: “尽管跑吧！你逃不出阿耳忒弥斯完美的瞄准！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.25|近战基础伤害*1.35
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipText: "Tremble, puny mortals, for the gods' inescapable anger shall be visited upon you!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，渺小的人类，众神无可逃避的怒火将降临到你们头上！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipText: "Keep your eyes open! The enemy may look to outflank us!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipZhCn: “睁大眼睛！别让敌人包抄我们！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.dataEffect: 近战破甲伤害*1.2|近战攻击+20.0|减少25.0%疲劳值
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.tooltipText: "You dare stand in the way of greatness? Feel the wrath of Olympus!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.tooltipZhCn: “你胆敢阻挡伟人的道路？感受奥林匹斯之怒吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_bulwark_spec_arm.tooltipText: "Not even the cyclopes shall move us from this place!"
troy_main_hero_defender_bulwark_spec_arm.tooltipZhCn: “哪怕独眼巨人也不能让我们从这里离开半步！”

troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipText: "Gods, focus my mind and body so that hunter and quarry are all that matter!"
troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipZhCn: “众神啊，请让我的全身心都投入狩猎吧！”

troy_adi_unit_passive_ferocity.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.2|近战基础伤害*1.2
troy_adi_unit_passive_ferocity.tooltipText: "Strike hard and true, before the toil of battle wears you out!"
troy_adi_unit_passive_ferocity.tooltipZhCn: “在你们因战斗而筋疲力竭之前，奋力出击！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipText: "To me! We cannot be lost if we believe in the gods – and in ourselves!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipZhCn: “过来！只要你们相信众神，相信自己，我们就绝不会落败！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_insult_sp.tooltipText: "Go boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person!"

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover_spe.tooltipText: "Shields up! Let no arrow stop our mighty charge!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover_spe.tooltipZhCn: “举盾！什么箭雨都无法阻挡我们强力的冲锋！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.dataEffect: 远程破甲伤害*1.4|远程基础伤害*1.4
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipText: "Guide my arrows true, o brother and sister of the hunt!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipZhCn: “一同狩猎的兄弟姐妹们啊，指引我的箭矢吧！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipText: "I scream your name to the heavens, Heracles! Grant me your indomitable might!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipZhCn: “我大声呼喊你的名字直达天庭，赫拉克勒斯！将你不可战胜的力量赐给我吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.dataEffect: 近战基础伤害*1.3|战斗获得怒气+2.0|非战斗获得怒气+2.0|士气+10.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipText: "Accept this sacrifice, o mighty lords of Olympus! Sanctify my blood with your divine purpose!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipZhCn: “接受这份牺牲吧，伟大的奥林匹斯众神！用你们的神性洗清我血中的罪孽！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipText: "Tire not, companions! Titanblood courses through our veins!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipZhCn: “勇士们，不要懈怠！我们的体内流淌着泰坦的血脉！”

troy_main_hero_self_sunder_spec_shield.tooltipText: "Ares' rage and Poseidon's strength combine! Tear bronze and flesh like so much cloth!"
troy_main_hero_self_sunder_spec_shield.tooltipZhCn: “用阿瑞斯的愤怒加上波塞冬的力量！像撕扯破布一样切开铠甲和血肉！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipText: "What fool would dare defile the sanctuary of the gods? Do not tempt their furious anger!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipZhCn: “什么样的蠢货胆敢亵渎众神的圣所？不要自寻死路！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.25|近战基础伤害*1.35|士气+20.0
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipText: "Tremble, puny mortals, for the gods' inescapable anger shall be visited upon you!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，渺小的人类，众神无可逃避的怒火将降临到你们头上！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipText: "I scream your name to the heavens, Heracles! Grant me your indomitable might!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_commandin.tooltipZhCn: “我大声呼喊你的名字直达天庭，赫拉克勒斯！将你不可战胜的力量赐给我吧！”

troy_main_hero_self_bloodthirst_spec_in_.dataEffect: 非战斗获得怒气+1.5|战斗获得怒气+2.0
troy_main_hero_self_bloodthirst_spec_in_.tooltipText: "Boil and rage, hunger and thirst, for the blood of thine mortal enemies."
troy_main_hero_self_bloodthirst_spec_in_.tooltipZhCn: “激昂吧，愤怒吧，饥渴吧，痛饮敌人的鲜血吧。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_battle_fury.tooltipText: "After a while, muscle memory takes over. You simply hack and hack until... well, until they're all dead."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_battle_fury.tooltipZhCn: “过了一段时间，你就是凭本能在行动了。你将不断攻击、攻击……直到敌人全都死光。”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock.tooltipText: "Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_throw_rock.tooltipZhCn: “噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你的一点点力量赐予我，使我在敌军阵中掀起血雨腥风！”

troy_adi_champion_ormenius_excellent_ran.tooltipText: "As Helios rains light upon this battlefield, so you will rain darkness. Loose!"
troy_adi_champion_ormenius_excellent_ran.tooltipZhCn: “让遮天蔽日的箭雨像太阳神的光芒一样遍满战场。放箭！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipText: "Tire not, companions! Titanblood courses through our veins!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_recupera.tooltipZhCn: “勇士们，不要懈怠！我们的体内流淌着泰坦的血脉！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.nameZhCn: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯之恩宠（治疗）
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipText: "Rise, soldier. Charon has embarked – your journey across the Styx can wait another day."
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipZhCn: “起来吧，战士。卡戎已然启程——今天还不是你们过斯堤克斯河的时候。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipText: "Divine Artemis, lend me the swiftness of your animal subjects!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipZhCn: “神圣的阿耳忒弥斯，将你如同走兽般的敏捷赐于我吧！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.dataEffect: 速度*1.2|远程基础伤害*1.3|近战防御+30.0|远程抗性+30.0
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.tooltipText: "Move with the speed of Hermes and strike with Artemis' peerless skill."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.tooltipZhCn: “行如赫耳墨斯般迅捷，动如阿耳忒弥斯般灵巧。”

troy_unit_blind_rage.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*-1.0|近战防御*0.75|近战攻击*0.9|近战基础伤害+250.0
troy_unit_blind_rage.tooltipText: "They say these savages are so overawed with their might, that they abandon all sense and respect for the gods."
troy_unit_blind_rage.tooltipZhCn: “据说这些蛮族如此信奉自己的力量，甚至抛弃了对众神的一切尊重。”

troy_adi_champion_epopeus_missile_block_.tooltipText: "Their arrows will break оn our shields like sea foam on stone."
troy_adi_champion_epopeus_missile_block_.tooltipZhCn: “他们的箭矢会被我们的盾牌折断，就像海浪拍打在石头上一样。”

troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_spe.tooltipText: Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!
troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock_spe.tooltipZhCn: 噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你些微的力量赐予我，让我在敌阵中掀起血雨腥风！

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_armstice_.tooltipText: "Let there be a lull in the hostilities between us while the gods judge our fate!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_armstice_.tooltipZhCn: “就让战火暂时熄灭，交给众神裁定我们的命运吧！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot_.tooltipText: "Apollo and Artemis, guide my arrows fast and true, that my enemies may not have time to draw their bows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot_.tooltipZhCn: “阿波罗和阿耳忒弥斯，指引我的箭射得又快又准，让我的敌人没有时间张弓！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape_spe.tooltipText: "It is not luck or fortune, or some special ability that the foe has that we do not, that allowed us to evade death, it was the will of the gods."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape_spe.tooltipZhCn: “让我们逃离死亡的并非某种敌人独有的本事，也无关好运，而是众神的旨意。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipText: "From Olympus itself, strike at my enemies with your rain of death, Apollo almighty!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipZhCn: “全能的阿波罗啊，从奥林匹斯山上向我的敌人降下死亡吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.attributeEffect: 引发恐惧|狂暴|死战不退
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipText: "By Ares, I shall drown the world in flames!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blind_rag.tooltipZhCn: “以阿瑞斯之名，我要让世界燃起烈火！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia_pass.dataEffect: 护甲*1.1|战斗获得怒气*1.1|近战攻击*1.1|近战破甲伤害*1.1|近战基础伤害*1.1|非战斗获得怒气*1.1|士气+8.0
troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia_pass.tooltipText: "My destiny has come – the gods of Olympus are by my side! May my enemies cower and the poets forever sing the glory of this day!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia_pass.tooltipZhCn: “我的时机已至——奥林匹斯众神站在我这边！愿我的敌人四散，诗人永远歌颂今日的荣耀！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.dataEffect: 近战基础伤害*1.15|远程格挡率*1.3
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.tooltipText: "I'll wake the silence in you, I'll shoot the violence through you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_embrace_o.tooltipZhCn: “唤醒心中野兽，勇取敌军人头！”

troy_main_myth_cyclops_boulder_toss.tooltipText: "Incoming! Poseidon himself must have joined the fray!"
troy_main_myth_cyclops_boulder_toss.tooltipZhCn: “飞过来了！一定是波塞冬亲自加入战场了！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave.dataEffect: 近战破甲伤害*1.2|近战攻击+20.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave.tooltipText: "You dare stand in the way of greatness? Feel the wrath of Olympus!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave.tooltipZhCn: “你胆敢阻挡伟人的道路？感受奥林匹斯之怒吧！”

troy_myth_shield_wall_formation.tooltipText: "Line your shields and brace yourselves in service of Zeus!"
troy_myth_shield_wall_formation.tooltipZhCn: “举起盾牌，保持警惕。为了宙斯！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.dataEffect: 远程基础伤害*1.5|近战防御+30.0|远程抗性+30.0
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.tooltipText: "Move with the speed of Hermes and strike with Artemis' peerless skill."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_strafe_spe.tooltipZhCn: “行如赫耳墨斯般迅捷，动如阿耳忒弥斯般灵巧。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_wary.tooltipText: "Their edge has dulled somewhat; bloody experience will make their blades shine once more!"
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_wary.tooltipZhCn: “这些枪刃多少有些暗淡了，让它们多多饮下鲜血吧，之后必将再度闪耀锋芒！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipText: "To me! We cannot be lost if we believe in the gods – and in ourselves!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipZhCn: “过来！只要你们相信众神，相信自己，我们就绝不会落败！”

troy_main_hero_self_bloodthirst.tooltipText: "Boil and rage, hunger and thirst, for the blood of thine mortal enemies."
troy_main_hero_self_bloodthirst.tooltipZhCn: “激昂吧，愤怒吧，饥渴吧，痛饮敌人的鲜血吧。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot.tooltipText: "Apollo and Artemis, guide my arrows fast and true, that my enemies may not have time to draw their bows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot.tooltipZhCn: “阿波罗和阿耳忒弥斯，指引我的箭射得又快又准，让我的敌人没有时间张弓！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on.tooltipText: "To me! We go on until the gods themselves command that we halt!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on.tooltipZhCn: “过来！除非众神有令，否则绝不要停下！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain_s.tooltipText: "Pah! You think your puny weapons can strike me down? I am invincible!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_ignore_pain_s.tooltipZhCn: “呸！你觉得你那小破武器能打倒我？我是无敌的！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipText: "Tremble, mortal, for today you will meet your fate, ordained by Zeus himself!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，凡人！今天你就会见证到宙斯钦定的命运！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.dataEffect: 远程基础伤害*1.1|装填技能+15.0
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipText: "Divine Artemis, lend me the swiftness of your animal subjects!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_rapid_fire.tooltipZhCn: “神圣的阿耳忒弥斯，将你猛兽般的迅捷赐于我吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, grant me your tenacity as I stare into the face of Hades!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，在我面对哈得斯时将您的坚韧赐予我吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.1|近战基础伤害*1.1|近战防御*1.1|冲锋加成+10.0
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipText: "Follow me and I shall lead you to glory without end!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipZhCn: “追随我，让我引领你们夺取无上的荣耀！”

troy_main_hero_defender_shield_spec_area.tooltipText: "In the frenzied rush of battle, everything becomes a weapon – even that with which we defend ourselves. Know this and live to fight again."
troy_main_hero_defender_shield_spec_area.tooltipZhCn: “在最疯狂的战斗中，哪怕是用来自保的东西也能当做武器。知道这一点就可以活下去参加下一场战斗了。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipText: "Solemn Hades beckons me, but from the heart of his realm I shall return the strike that has lain me low!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipZhCn: “肃然的哈得斯召唤我了，但我要从冥府回来，然后替我挨的那一下报仇！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.dataEffect: 近战基础伤害*1.3|战斗获得怒气+2.0|非战斗获得怒气+2.0|士气+10.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipText: "Accept this sacrifice, o mighty lords of Olympus! Sanctify my blood with your divine purpose!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_blood_sac.tooltipZhCn: “接受这份牺牲吧，伟大的奥林匹斯众神！用你们的神性洗清我血中的罪孽！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia.dataEffect: 护甲*1.2|近战攻击*1.3|战斗获得怒气*2.0|非战斗获得怒气*2.0|每1.0s增加25血量
troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia.attributeEffect: 技能无冷却时间|死战不退
troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia.tooltipText: "My destiny has come – the gods of Olympus are by my side! May my enemies cower and the poets forever sing the glory of this day!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_aristeia.tooltipZhCn: “我的时机已至——奥林匹斯众神站在我这边！愿我的敌人四散，诗人永远歌颂今日的荣耀！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover_spe.tooltipText: "Shields up! Let no arrow stop our mighty charge!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover_spe.tooltipZhCn: “举盾！什么箭雨都无法阻挡我们强力的冲锋！”

troy_main_minotaur_savage_roar.tooltipText: "They say that in many cases, the beast's bark is far worse than its bite. This is not one of those cases!"
troy_main_minotaur_savage_roar.tooltipZhCn: “人们总说野兽的叫喊比撕咬更可怕。不过这只可未必如此！”

troy_main_hero_self_sunder_spec_speed.tooltipText: "Ares' rage and Poseidon's strength combine! Tear bronze and flesh like so much cloth!"
troy_main_hero_self_sunder_spec_speed.tooltipZhCn: “用阿瑞斯的愤怒加上波塞冬的力量！像撕扯破布一样切开铠甲和血肉！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipText: "Keep the enemy distracted! Strike at their flanks before they recover!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipZhCn: “牵制敌军！从侧翼杀他们个措手不及！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipText: "May Lord Ares, slayer of men, strike at your heart and paralyse you with dread!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_battle_cr.tooltipZhCn: “愿凡人杀手阿瑞斯屠戮你的肉体，让你魂飞魄散！”

troy_main_hero_defender_shield_spec_dama.tooltipText: "In the frenzied rush of battle, everything becomes a weapon – even that with which we defend ourselves. Know this and live to fight again."
troy_main_hero_defender_shield_spec_dama.tooltipZhCn: “在最疯狂的战斗中，哪怕是用来自保的东西也能当做武器。知道这一点就可以活下去参加下一场战斗了。”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.dataEffect: 非战斗获得怒气+3.0|每1.0s增加6血量
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipText: "Do not let me fall here today, fair Lady Athena, for I have many more battles to win in your name!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipZhCn: “敬爱的雅典娜，请不要让我的生命在今日终结，因为我还想要为你挥兵破阵！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on.tooltipText: "Warriors, to me! By the might of gleaming-eyed Athena, we shall prevail!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on.tooltipZhCn: “战士们，过来！美目的雅典娜赐予了我们力量，我们必将胜利！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.dataEffect: 远程爆炸破甲伤害*1.3|远程爆炸基础伤害*1.3
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipText: "The poison tip penetrates the shield, or armour plates, right through to the skin – and from there, the soul itself."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipZhCn: “剧毒之刺可以穿透盾牌和盔甲，刺进皮肤——借此洞穿敌人的灵魂。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk_spec.tooltipText: "I am the blade in darkness. I am the strike unseen."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk_spec.tooltipZhCn: “我是阴影中的利剑，我在黑暗中出击。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*-1.0|近战基础伤害*1.3|增加24.0%疲劳值
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy.tooltipText: "As murderous Ares is my witness, I shall see you all dead before my rage is quenched!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_frenzy.tooltipZhCn: “凶残的阿瑞斯见证，我的怒火平息前，你们都得死！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.nameZhCn: 阿耳忒弥斯之急速（冷却）
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipText: "Artemis of the golden reins, grant me the sureness of your arrows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipZhCn: “金色弓弦的阿耳忒弥斯，把你百发百中的箭法赐给我！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.nameZhCn: 赫拉克勒斯决心（持续时间）
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, grant me your tenacity as I stare into the face of Hades!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_heroic_r.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，在我面对哈得斯时将您的坚韧赐予我吧！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover.tooltipText: "Shields up! Let no arrow stop our mighty charge!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_cover.tooltipZhCn: “举盾！什么箭雨都无法阻挡我们强力的冲锋！”

troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_duration.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*0.75|速度*1.25|溅射攻击威力*1.3|冲锋加成*1.5
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_duration.tooltipText: Chaos and despair break all enemy lines.
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_duration.tooltipZhCn: 混乱与绝望能摧毁所有敌人的阵线。

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.dataEffect: 近战破甲伤害*1.3|近战基础伤害*1.3|近战攻击间隔+2.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, lend your godlike strength to my striking arm!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，将你的神力赐予我吧！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.nameZhCn: 阿耳忒弥斯之急速（消耗）
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipText: "Artemis of the golden reins, grant me the sureness of your arrows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipZhCn: “金色弓弦的阿耳忒弥斯，把你百发百中的箭法赐给我！”

troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury_spec_d.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.4|近战基础伤害*1.5|特殊保护+50.0
troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury_spec_d.tooltipText: Hero has a chance of going berserk

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.dataEffect: 近战破甲伤害*1.35|近战攻击+20.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.tooltipText: "You dare stand in the way of greatness? Feel the wrath of Olympus!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_cleave_sp.tooltipZhCn: “你胆敢阻挡伟人的道路？感受奥林匹斯之怒吧！”

troy_main_unit_weapon_switching_passive.tooltipText: "There will come a time when two hands will be better than one. You will know instinctively when that is."
troy_main_unit_weapon_switching_passive.tooltipZhCn: “总有一天你会知道，双拳胜过单手。到时候你自然就明白了。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipText: "You demand honour for the fallen? They had their chance to earn it whilst still they lived!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_desecrate.tooltipZhCn: “你想为死者讨回公道？他们生前可是亲手浪费了机会！”

troy_adi_champion_asteropaios_accuracy_a.tooltipText: "If you miss, I will make you go over there and retrieve your arrows yourselves!"
troy_adi_champion_asteropaios_accuracy_a.tooltipZhCn: “要是你射失了，我就会让你亲自去到敌阵里把箭矢捡回来！”

troy_main_hero_self_regeneration.tooltipText: "Truly, this is a gift from Olympus! Gods be praised, for their faithful fighter has been preserved this day!"

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipText: "Keep your eyes open! The enemy may look to outflank us!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipZhCn: “睁大眼睛！别让敌人包抄我们！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_abiltiy_embrace_o.tooltipText: "I'll wake the silence in you, I'll shoot the violence through you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_abiltiy_embrace_o.tooltipZhCn: “唤醒心中野兽，勇取敌军人头！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.nameZhCn: 阿波罗之箭雨（护甲穿透）
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.dataEffect: 远程破甲伤害*1.3|装填技能*1.3|精度*2.0
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipText: "From Olympus itself, strike at my enemies with your rain of death, Apollo almighty!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_apollos_ra.tooltipZhCn: “全能的阿波罗啊，从奥林匹斯山上向我的敌人降下死亡吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipText: "What fool would dare defile the sanctuary of the gods? Do not tempt their furious anger!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipZhCn: “什么样的蠢货胆敢亵渎众神的圣所？不要自寻死路！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot_.tooltipText: "Apollo and Artemis, guide my arrows fast and true, that my enemies may not have time to draw their bows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_multishot_.tooltipZhCn: “阿波罗和阿耳忒弥斯，指引我的箭射得又快又准，让我的敌人没有时间张弓！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover.tooltipText: "Almighty Zeus, king of the gods, shield me from my enemies' blows, that I might fight for you another day."
troy_main_hero_all_ability_find_cover.tooltipZhCn: “全能的宙斯，众神之王，请庇护我，让我在敌人的攻击中屹立不倒。择日我定会为你而战。”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipText: "What fool would dare defile the sanctuary of the gods? Do not tempt their furious anger!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_hallowed.tooltipZhCn: “什么样的蠢货胆敢亵渎众神的圣所？不要自寻死路！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipText: "Solemn Hades beckons me, but from the heart of his realm I shall return the strike that has lain me low!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipZhCn: “神圣的哈得斯召唤我了，但我要从冥府回来，然后替我挨的那一下报仇！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_insult_sp.tooltipText: "Go boil your bottoms, sons of a silly person!"

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_armstice.tooltipText: "Let there be a lull in the hostilities between us while the gods judge our fate!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_armstice.tooltipZhCn: “在众神判定我们命运之际，就让我们之间的战火暂时熄灭吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.1|近战基础伤害*1.1|近战防御*1.1|士气+10.0
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipText: "Follow me and I shall lead you to glory without end!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_set_exam.tooltipZhCn: “追随我，让我引领你们夺取无上的荣耀！”

troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_spec_weapo.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*0.75|速度*1.25|溅射攻击威力*1.3|近战基础伤害*1.3|冲锋加成*1.5
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_spec_weapo.tooltipText: Chaos and despair break all enemy lines.
troy_adi_hero_ability_shatter_spec_weapo.tooltipZhCn: 混乱与绝望能摧毁所有敌人的阵线。

troy_main_duel_spec_armor.tooltipText: "We must fight until only one remains!"

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_to_the_last.tooltipText: "Ignore the pain. Draw on reserves of strength and stamina gifted to us by the gods themselves!"
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_to_the_last.tooltipZhCn: “学着无视肉体的疼痛，汲取众神赐予的力量！”

troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.4|近战基础伤害*1.5
troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury.tooltipText: Hero has a chance of going berserk

troy_dlc1_unit_inspire_to_the_last.tooltipText: "Ignore the pain. Draw on reserves of strength and stamina gifted to us by the gods themselves!"
troy_dlc1_unit_inspire_to_the_last.tooltipZhCn: “学着无视肉体的疼痛，汲取众神赐予的力量！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk_spec.tooltipText: "I am the blade in darkness. I am the strike unseen."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk_spec.tooltipZhCn: “我是阴影中的利剑，我在黑暗中出击。”

troy_main_unit_spread_and_charge.tooltipText: "Stand apart, my warriors. They will not break our line by shaft or arrowflight alone."
troy_main_unit_spread_and_charge.tooltipZhCn: “分散开来，我的勇士们。别让标枪或是箭矢打乱我们的阵线。”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on_.tooltipText: "Warriors, to me! By the might of gleaming-eyed Athena, we shall prevail!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on_.tooltipZhCn: “战士们，过来！美目的雅典娜赐予了我们力量，我们必将胜利！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipText: "Never lose sight of victory, that glorious prize that the gods have laid out for you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipZhCn: “永远不要失去胜利的希望，众神早已为你备好奖赏。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify_r.tooltipText: "Cower, foolish humans, for Phobos and Deimos move among your feeble number!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify_r.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，愚蠢的凡人，福波斯和德摩斯就在你们当中！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipText: "Do not let me fall here today, fair Lady Athena, for I have many more battles to win in your name!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipZhCn: “敬爱的雅典娜，请不要让我的生命在今日终结，因为我还想要为你挥兵破阵！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipText: "To me! We cannot be lost if we believe in the gods – and in ourselves!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_rallying_.tooltipZhCn: “过来！只要你们相信众神，相信自己，我们就绝不会落败！”

troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipText: "Never lose sight of victory, that glorious prize that the gods have laid out for you!"
troy_dlc1_hero_warlord_ability_none_left.tooltipZhCn: “永远不要失去胜利的希望，众神早已为你备好奖赏。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipText: "Strike on the move! Swift as a mare, like Lord Chiron taught us!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipZhCn: “开始行动！就像脱缰的野马那样，这是喀戎的教诲！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt.tooltipText: "Face me now, or fearsome Ares shall visit his fury upon you!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt.tooltipZhCn: “现在快站出来，否则可怕的阿瑞斯会向你倾泻他的怒火！”

troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock.tooltipText: Grant me an iota of your strength, o Heracles, so I may crush my enemies!
troy_adi_hero_all_ability_throw_rock.tooltipZhCn: 噢，赫拉克勒斯，请将你些微的力量赐予我，让我在敌阵中掀起血雨腥风！

troy_main_hero_defender_shield_bash.tooltipText: "In the frenzied rush of battle, everything becomes a weapon – even that with which we defend ourselves. Know this and live to fight again."
troy_main_hero_defender_shield_bash.tooltipZhCn: “在最疯狂的战斗中，哪怕是用来自保的东西也能当做武器。知道这一点就可以活下去参加下一场战斗了。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔+1.0|近战破甲伤害*1.3|近战基础伤害*1.3
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, lend your godlike strength to my striking arm!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，将你的神力赐予我吧！”

troy_adi_champion_orsilochus_charge_aura.tooltipText: "Want to make them run away? Run towards them!"
troy_adi_champion_orsilochus_charge_aura.tooltipZhCn: “想让敌人逃走吗？那就冲向他们吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.nameZhCn: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯之恩宠
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipText: "Rise, soldier. Charon has embarked – your journey across the Styx can wait another day."
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipZhCn: “起来吧，战士。卡戎已然启程——今天还不是你们过斯堤克斯河的时候。”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.nameZhCn: 阿斯克勒庇俄斯之恩宠（冷却）
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipText: "Rise, soldier. Charon has embarked – your journey across the Styx can wait another day."
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_care_for.tooltipZhCn: “起来吧，战士。卡戎已然启程——今天还不是你们过斯堤克斯河的时候。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipText: "Artemis of the golden reins, grant me the sureness of your arrows!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_relentless.tooltipZhCn: “金色弓弦的阿耳忒弥斯，把你百发百中的箭法赐给我！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.25|近战基础伤害*1.35|减少25.0%疲劳值
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipText: "Tremble, puny mortals, for the gods' inescapable anger shall be visited upon you!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_shout_of_.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，渺小的人类，众神无可逃避的怒火将降临到你们头上！”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_cover_spec_to.tooltipText: "Shields up! Let no arrow stop our mighty charge!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_cover_spec_to.tooltipZhCn: “举盾！什么箭雨都无法阻挡我们强力的冲锋！”

troy_adi_hero_diomedes_ability_frenzy.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*-1.0|近战基础伤害*1.3|增加24.0%疲劳值
troy_adi_hero_diomedes_ability_frenzy.tooltipText: As murderous Ares is my witness, I shall see you all dead before my rage is quenched!
troy_adi_hero_diomedes_ability_frenzy.tooltipZhCn: 凶残的阿瑞斯见证，我的怒火平息前，你们都得死！

troy_adi_champion_horkios_defensive_aura.tooltipText: "Put your faith in Zeus and He will shield you!"

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace_sp.tooltipText: "Not even the mighty Heracles himself can move me from this spot!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace_sp.tooltipZhCn: “哪怕是大能的赫拉克勒斯来了，也休想让我从这里动摇半步。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.dataEffect: 速度*1.2|近战攻击*1.3|冲锋加成*1.5
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.tooltipText: "Begone, defeated worm! You are unworthy of facing me!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish_.tooltipZhCn: “退散吧，战败的虫豸！你不配面对我！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipText: "Keep your eyes open! The enemy may look to outflank us!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_warning_s.tooltipZhCn: “睁大眼睛！敌人可能会包抄我们！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.nameZhCn: 阿瑞斯之惧（远程抗性弱化）
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipText: "May Ares' sons strike paralysing terror into your hearts!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipZhCn: “愿阿瑞斯之子把恐惧刻在你的心里！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipText: "May Apollo, lord of light, pour into me and strike you dead where you stand!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_precise_sh.tooltipZhCn: “愿光之王阿波罗赐予我力量，然后就地击败你！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on_.tooltipText: "To me! We go on until the gods themselves command that we halt!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_march_on_.tooltipZhCn: “过来！除非众神有令，否则绝不要停下！”

troy_adi_champion_enyalius_melee_defence.nameZhCn: 阿瑞斯与雅典娜的恩惠
troy_adi_champion_enyalius_melee_defence.tooltipText: "War is simple. You hit the other one. You don't let them hit you. You win."
troy_adi_champion_enyalius_melee_defence.tooltipZhCn: “战争其实很简单。杀死敌人，保护自己，然后你就赢了。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_battle_fervour.tooltipText: "All of us have a talent, though we may not know it. Something we are born to do. In my case, it is war."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_battle_fervour.tooltipZhCn: “虽然我们或许并不自知，但每个人都有自己的天赋，我们也是为此而生。对我来说，那就是战争。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.dataEffect: 近战破甲伤害*1.3|近战基础伤害*1.3|近战攻击间隔+2.0
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipText: "Mighty Heracles, lend your godlike strength to my striking arm!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_focused_s.tooltipZhCn: “伟大的赫拉克勒斯，将你的神力赐予我吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace.tooltipText: "Not even the mighty Heracles himself can move me from this spot!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_brace.tooltipZhCn: “哪怕是强大的赫拉克勒斯本人，也不能让我从这里离开半步。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipText: "The poison tip penetrates the shield, or armour plates, right through to the skin – and from there, the soul itself."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_explosive_.tooltipZhCn: “剧毒之刺可以穿透盾牌和盔甲，刺进皮肤——借此洞穿敌人的灵魂。”

troy_main_unit_weapon_switching.dataEffect: 远程格挡率-60.0|近战防御-20.0|速度*1.15|近战攻击+12.0|冲锋加成+16.0|近战基础伤害+18.0
troy_main_unit_weapon_switching.tooltipText: "There will come a time when two hands will be better than one. You will know instinctively when that is."
troy_main_unit_weapon_switching.tooltipZhCn: “总有一天你会知道，双拳胜过单手。到时候你自然就明白了。”

troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔-1.0|近战防御*0.85|近战攻击+30.0
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipText: "The final swing is not a drill, it's how many people I can kill!"
troy_dlc1_hero_fighter_ability_battle_so.tooltipZhCn: “嘿兄弟这可不是练习，接下我的最后一击，然后细数我的胜利！”

troy_adi_hero_diomedes_self_athena_might.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.3|辉煌时刻点数获取*4.0
troy_adi_hero_diomedes_self_athena_might.tooltipText: "Daughter of Zeus, Lady of the Aegis, guide my blade into this fight!"
troy_adi_hero_diomedes_self_athena_might.tooltipZhCn: “宙斯之女，手持羊皮盾的女神，请在这场战斗中指引我的剑刃吧！”

troy_dlc1_unit_inspire_fierce_resolve.dataEffect: 冲锋加成+8.0|近战基础伤害+8.0|近战攻击+12.0
troy_dlc1_unit_inspire_fierce_resolve.tooltipText: "So complete is their training, so thorough their drill, these gods-blessed warriors will only fight on when adversity strikes."
troy_dlc1_unit_inspire_fierce_resolve.tooltipZhCn: “她们早已久经锤炼，当灾难降临，这些神佑勇士们将奋起而战。”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipText: "Release the birds! May this improper omen turn our enemies' bowels to water! In sight of the gods, yes!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipZhCn: “释放群鸟！在众神面前，愿这不祥之兆为敌人带去毁灭！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter_sp.tooltipText: "With bloody fists I'll batter – like a ten ton hammer, son!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter_sp.tooltipZhCn: “小子，我这双拳头可不是吃素的！”

troy_adi_champion_canopus_ellusive.tooltipText: "See, they tire! It is our turn now."
troy_adi_champion_canopus_ellusive.tooltipZhCn: “快看，他们累了！现在轮到我们了。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk.tooltipText: "I am the blade in darkness. I am the strike unseen."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_stalk.tooltipZhCn: “我是阴影中的利剑，我在黑暗中出击。”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_wicked_bronze_100.tooltipText: "Bronze, sadly, is like a mortal warrior, with all their failings: the more it kills, the more likely it is to blunt and chip."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_wicked_bronze_100.tooltipZhCn: “青铜与凡人一样，都有自己的极限：杀人越多，就越可能变钝甚至碎裂。”

troy_main_hero_defender_bulwark.tooltipText: "Not even the cyclopes shall move us from this place!"
troy_main_hero_defender_bulwark.tooltipZhCn: “哪怕独眼巨人也不能让我们从这里离开半步！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish.tooltipText: "Begone, defeated worm! You are unworthy of facing me!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_vanquish.tooltipZhCn: “退散吧，战败的虫豸！你不配面对我！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.dataEffect: 近战防御*0.5|近战基础伤害*0.75
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipText: "Keep the enemy distracted! Strike at their flanks before they recover!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_seize_the.tooltipZhCn: “牵制敌军！从侧翼杀他们个措手不及！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on_.tooltipText: "Warriors, to me! By the might of gleaming-eyed Athena, we shall prevail!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_fight_on_.tooltipZhCn: “战士们，过来！美目的雅典娜赐予了我们力量，我们必将胜利！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.nameZhCn: 半人马训练（提升装填速度）
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipText: "Strike on the move! Swift as a mare, like Lord Chiron taught us!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_born_with_.tooltipZhCn: “开始行动！就像脱缰的野马那样，这是喀戎的教诲！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.nameZhCn: 奥林匹斯之掷（冷却时间）
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipText: "Lords of Olympus, guide my arm to strike at my opponents' heads! A single shot is all I require."
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipZhCn: “奥林匹斯众神，助我的臂膀投中敌人的首级！我只求这一击命中。”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter_sp.tooltipText: "With bloody fists I'll batter – like a ten ton hammer, son!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_batter_sp.tooltipZhCn: “小子，我这双拳头可不是吃素的！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipText: "May Ares' sons strike paralysing terror into your hearts!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_dread_of.tooltipZhCn: “愿阿瑞斯之子把恐惧刻在你的心里！”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_eager.tooltipText: "Battle, blood, fire, death. In sight of the divine. What else is there?"
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_eager.tooltipZhCn: “战斗、鲜血、火焰、死亡。日光之下，可有新事？”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_forest_fighter.tooltipText: "Those who are born to the forest and its ways can see the wood for the trees; the dense undergrowth does not slow or cause them to falter – it enhances them, in fact."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_forest_fighter.tooltipZhCn: “诞于山者能于云深中知处，诞于林者不为一叶而障目。茂密的树丛并不会拖延她们的脚步——反会将他们庇护。”

troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury_spec_d.dataEffect: 近战攻击*1.8|近战基础伤害*1.9
troy_adi_hero_passive_battle_fury_spec_d.tooltipText: Hero has a chance of going berserk

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.dataEffect: 远程破甲伤害*1.4|远程基础伤害*1.4
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipText: "Guide my arrows true, o brother and sister of the hunt!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipZhCn: “一同狩猎的兄弟姐妹们啊，指引我的箭矢吧！”

troy_adi_hero_diomedes_ability_frenzy_sp.dataEffect: 近战攻击间隔*-1.0|近战基础伤害*1.3|增加12.0%疲劳值
troy_adi_hero_diomedes_ability_frenzy_sp.tooltipText: As murderous Ares is my witness, I shall see you all dead before my rage is quenched!

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipText: "I bring Ares' gift of death to all of you here today! Take that!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipZhCn: “阿瑞斯托我带了礼物，那就是你们的死亡！来吧！”

troy_adi_champion_boreas_scout.dataEffect: 树林发现距离*1.5|灌木丛发现距离*1.5|视野*1.5
troy_adi_champion_boreas_scout.tooltipText: "Yes, I see it… Oh, you don't? Really?"
troy_adi_champion_boreas_scout.tooltipZhCn: “是的，我看到了……喔，你没看到吗？真的？”

troy_bull_rush.tooltipText: "Mess with the bull, you get the horns!"
troy_bull_rush.tooltipZhCn: “惹怒了公牛，你就等着被顶吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt_sp.tooltipText: "Face me now, or fearsome Ares shall visit his fury upon you!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_taunt_sp.tooltipZhCn: “快点站出来，不然就等着面对阿瑞斯的怒火吧！”

troy_dlc1_unit_passive_fierce_resolve.dataEffect: 冲锋加成+8.0|近战基础伤害+8.0|近战攻击+12.0
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_fierce_resolve.tooltipText: "So complete is their training, so thorough their drill, these gods-blessed warriors will only fight on when adversity strikes."
troy_dlc1_unit_passive_fierce_resolve.tooltipZhCn: “她们早已久经锤炼，当灾难降临，这些神佑勇士们将奋起而战。”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipText: "Tremble, mortal, for today you will meet your fate, ordained by Zeus himself!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，凡人！今日你们就要见证宙斯钦定的命运！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipText: "Tremble, mortal, for today you will meet your fate, ordained by Zeus himself!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_marked_fo.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，凡人！今日你们就要见证宙斯钦定的命运！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipText: "Lords of Olympus, guide my arm to strike at my opponents' heads! A single shot is all I require."
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipZhCn: “奥林匹斯众神，助我的臂膀投中敌人的首级！我只求这一击命中。”

troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipText: "O mighty lords of Olympus! Lend me strength and cunning to defeat the foe!"
troy_main_hero_all_ability_divine_inspir.tooltipZhCn: “强大的奥林匹斯众神！借我力量与智慧，令我击败敌人吧！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipText: "I bring Ares' gift of death to all of you here today! Take that!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_jump_in_b.tooltipZhCn: “阿瑞斯托我带了礼物，那就是你们的死亡！来吧！”

troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.dataEffect: 每1.0s增加6血量|减少50.0%疲劳值
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipText: "Do not let me fall here today, fair Lady Athena, for I have many more battles to win in your name!"
troy_main_hero_defender_ability_second_w.tooltipZhCn: “敬爱的雅典娜，请不要让我的生命在今日终结，因为我还想要为你挥兵破阵！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.dataEffect: 远程破甲伤害*1.6|远程基础伤害*1.6
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipText: "Guide my arrows true, o brother and sister of the hunt!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_inspired_s.tooltipZhCn: “一同狩猎的兄弟姐妹们啊，指引我的箭矢吧！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape.tooltipText: "It is not luck or fortune, or some special ability that the foe has that we do not, that allowed us to evade death, it was the will of the gods."
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_escape.tooltipZhCn: “让我们逃离死亡的并非某种敌人独有的本事，也无关好运，而是众神的旨意。”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye_.dataEffect: 远程破甲伤害*1.2|射程*1.3|精度*1.5
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye_.tooltipText: "Run all you like! You'll never escape Artemis' perfect aim!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_eagle_eye_.tooltipZhCn: “尽管跑吧！你逃不出阿耳忒弥斯完美的瞄准！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify.tooltipText: "Cower, foolish humans, for Phobos and Deimos move among your feeble number!"
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_terrify.tooltipZhCn: “颤抖吧，愚蠢的凡人，福波斯和德摩斯行进在你们当中！”

troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipText: "Solemn Hades beckons me, but from the heart of his realm I shall return the strike that has lain me low!"
troy_main_hero_archer_ability_cheat_hade.tooltipZhCn: “肃然的哈得斯召唤我了，但我要从冥府回来，然后替我挨的那一下报仇！”

troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipText: "Gods, focus my mind and body so that hunter and quarry are all that matter!"
troy_dlc1_hero_archer_ability_deadly_foc.tooltipZhCn: “众神啊，请让我的全身心都投入狩猎吧！”

troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipText: "Release the birds! May this improper omen turn our enemies' bowels to water! In sight of the gods, yes!"
troy_main_hero_warlord_ability_false_pro.tooltipZhCn: “释放群鸟！众神在上，愿这不祥之兆为敌人带去毁灭！”

troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipText: "Lords of Olympus, guide my arm to strike at my opponents' heads! A single shot is all I require."
troy_main_hero_fighter_ability_throw_spe.tooltipZhCn: “奥林匹斯众神，助我的臂膀投中敌人的首级！我只求这一击命中。”
